data.persona: I oversee the castle's chapel.  I collect alms for the poor.  I am the spiritual leader of the subjects of the kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the chamber entrance.
The entrance to the chamber is very ornate. It is filled with many religious symbols. There are candles and prayer books on  a table right next to the door. It is a wooden door. There is a sign near the front, which lists the name of people within the church. They can smell the scent of candles burning.
The people is here.

You are carrying a Oil, and wearing a Religious Symbol and a Necklaces.

data.short_motivation: I wish to comfort the people at the chapel for the prince's funeral
data.mid_motivation: I would like to conduct a proper funeral service
data.long_motivation: I want to pull the king and the kingdom out of depression
